message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a deal, but I'd like to get a better price.
I understand your concerns, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $130. It's still a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm still interested in the product, but I'd like to get a bit closer to my target price.
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob! I can offer you the product for $125. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob! I can offer you the product for $120. It's the best I can do, and I think it's a fair price. What do you think?
